summary: All four requirements (REQ-9, REQ-10, REQ-11, REQ-12) are fully implemented. Backend functions for setting and retrieving daily calorie goals were added in backend/main.mo with proper authentication and per-user storage. Frontend includes a GoalSettingForm component with validation and error handling. The CaloriesSummary component displays the current goal and a progress bar toward the goal. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added (backend/migration.mo) to handle state migration for new dailyCalorieGoals field
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention migration logic or state upgrades as a requirement. This is an implementation detail beyond the scope of the requirements.

The BuildRequest does not mention URL parameter handling, session storage utilities, or admin token management as part of the daily goal feature. This appears to be infrastructure unrelated to the requirements.
